        message - contains nickname of the player that want to skip

        message - contains the type of request

      • visit

        void visit(MessageClientDisconnected message)

        Parameters:
        message - contains the nickname of the winner

      • visit

        void visit(MessageToolResponse message)
        manage the usage of a tool
        Parameters:
        message - contains all parameter necessary to handle the usage of the tool
